website_summaries.verdict: The 10-count kits are extremely affordable. Handles may not be as deep as other pulls, but they perform well and feature a modern brushed metal style.
pros: Ideal for bulk orders on larger renovations
Standard 3-inch hole locations make upgrades easier
cons: Handles are not very deep and may be difficult to grab
Included screws may be too long or short for some drawers

customer_reviews.title: Loved these! Excellent price!
customer_reviews.text: These were beautiful and were a great quality! I was especially excited about the low cost! We are planning to do cabinet upgrades in our kitchen and we will def buy these again!!!
customer_reviews.author: ilovereborns

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful
customer_reviews.text: Great quality for the price, though screws are too long for my 5/8" thick cabinet doors. Otherwise perfect for our quick kitchen facelift on a budget.
customer_reviews.author: LO

customer_reviews.title: Not bad for the price.
customer_reviews.text: These were ok. The price was nice but smaller then expected. Not real heavy either... can tell these a bit cheaper but for the price can't go wrong.
customer_reviews.author: B

customer_reviews.title: Good but small
customer_reviews.text: I have replaced all of the handles in our kitchen with these. 2 problems i have had with them. 1. The screws for the most part a just a little too short for some of the doors. 2. The finger slot is really shallow. Its very easy to get your fingers caught in it when you're opening a cabinet. It hurts more then you think and if you're not careful, you can break or sprain something. Other then that, they do look pretty nice and were a good deal. Next time i will buy ones that have a larger finger area.
customer_reviews.author: Ian MazurskyTop Contributor: Cooking

customer_reviews.title: Screws do not work with this item.
customer_reviews.text: The screws enclosed in the item did not work for the drawer pull. I had to quickly go to Home Depot to try and find the screws that would work and ended up getting something else at Home Depot. The pull looks good and I would have used it if the screws would work for me. As it turn out I had to buy replacements at Home Depot due to time contraint of the contractor. It was his last day on the project and this was the last thing he had to do. I did not want him to wait on this.
customer_reviews.author: Smiley

customer_reviews.title: Look great, bit shallow and needed to buy screws.
customer_reviews.text: I love the look of the handles. They are metal, brushed finish and quite stylish. They aren't very deep, so may not be comfortable for larger hands. The screws I received did not work for my cabinets; too long for the doors and too short for the drawers. The screws supplied appear to be #8-32-1.25", I need a 1" for the doors and 1.5" for the drawers. But, honestly, the manufacturer can't supply hardware for every situation.
customer_reviews.author: S. Barto

customer_reviews.title: Still looks great, just different
customer_reviews.text: Why do they lose one star? Because the "satin nickel" finish isn't as satin as most things with that descriptor. Still looks great, just different. But for the price (I got them as an add on for $6.99) I'm very satisfied. My cabinets are old and awful and need to be changed eventually so while I preferred other styles of pulls, I didn't want to spend a lot just to improve what I plan to get rid of. They're a solid, heavy metal and the screws were actually the right length: 1 inch. Vast improvement over the old brass handles I had, and for very little money.
customer_reviews.author: SamTop Contributor: Makeup

customer_reviews.title: Not top of the line, but will get the job done.
customer_reviews.text: The screws were too long for my slab cabinet door, and too short for the drawers. I have standard kitchen cabinets nothing fancy, just plain slab front cabinets. I had to go to Home Depot and get 1 1/4" screws for the drawers and 3/4" screws for the cabinet doors. The handles seem pretty durable for the price. They aren't heavy solid metal, but they'll do for the moderate us I'll be putting them too. They are replacing white plastic handles so they are better then what I had.
customer_reviews.author: Brenda Barnes

customer_reviews.title: Works great
customer_reviews.text: Easy to put on and work as designed. No problems. Used these for a dresser we painted.
customer_reviews.author: Katie Dushane

customer_reviews.title: Nice hardware handles.
customer_reviews.text: I bought these to update drawer handles in our main bathroom. The others were always catching clothes, that's why I really like the rounded shape to these handles. They seem lightweight but I didn't want to spend a lot on them, so I got what I expected. Yet, they are sturdy and simple, just what I wanted in the bathroom. They matched the brushed look on our knobs for the cabinets. Really a good value. I think the only reason I gave 4* instead of 5* is because of the weight of them. Overall, they are great.
customer_reviews.author: TeresaNC

customer_reviews.title: New handles are saving my nails and look fabulous.....
customer_reviews.text: Amazing!!!! We needed 40 drawer pulls for our new home and the hardware stores were so expensive that we went a year without pulls on our cupboards and drawers. Plus our whole house is brushed nichol in all the metal work. I did have to buy new screws as the frame work was 1/4 inch thicker than usual, but that was easy to get. The kitchen and bathrooms look amazing. The handles look just like the new frig, dishwasher, stove, and microwave handles. We love it. Oh! And 2 days after I ordered, they were delivered. Can't get better than that.
customer_reviews.author: Ms. T

customer_reviews.title: Fit great.  looks great
customer_reviews.text: These look nice. I did not have any defects with any of the handles and I purchased 40 of them. The screws fit all the cabinet doors. I had to drill a bigger hole than the screw head through the drawer frame up to the drawer face so that the screws would fit which is normal and cheaper than buying longer screws. I used a template made by ROK which i bought on amazon which worked perfectly and allowed all my handles to be centered properly and consitent from door to door. Very pleased with the final result. I recommend these pulls and would purchase them again.
customer_reviews.author: V. Beckner

customer_reviews.title: Screw depth is the only issue
customer_reviews.text: These are a good value, but the depth of the screw is very annoying. Basically the screws will only go in a few turns, so if your cabinet isn't exactly the right thickness, you will have to add washers or something to make up the difference. I used these in a new travel trailer build-out for a bunch of things, and they were a great value, but the screw depth was annoying. I had longer and shorter screws but I still had to add spacers (wood or washers) to make up the difference when I installed them.
customer_reviews.author: Justme

customer_reviews.title: Sleek and solid
customer_reviews.text: I am impressed. Yes I have ugly cabinets! But the handles are the focus :) At this price-point and this style I could only find hollow back drawpulls which feel, look and are cheap. These are one solid piece! Some complain that it doesn't have a lot of arc, that is a style choice I am glad because they look beautiful. I can't imagine more of a hump. The are very easy to grab. Not sure why that was a complaint. I am a happy woman 5 stars from me.
customer_reviews.author: Beth K

customer_reviews.title: Streamline look and function with a modern feel at time of use.
customer_reviews.text: I like the way they are smooth and will not get hooked on anything when I move my portable cabinet around my shop. They also are comfortable to operate and provide a great handle to make my drawers function in and out during use.
customer_reviews.author: Clara Belle Nielsen

customer_reviews.title: well made, looks nice
customer_reviews.text: Clean looking, well made, heavy handle for the price. Handles have some weight to them when you pick them up and don't feel flimsy. They do the job they are supposed to do. Enough room for several fingers in the handle to open cabinet. Several reviews listed there wasn't enough room for your fingers. I would buy more for next kitchen job.
customer_reviews.author: Green family

customer_reviews.title: Very good for the price.
customer_reviews.text: Bought these for the built in wardrobe drawers I made. I wanted ones that when you walk past didn't catch you. After much searching, these seemed to fit the criteria. They are perfect. Not too big, But sturdy enough to get the job done. For the price, I can't recommend these enough. Update, bought 3 more packs as these are such good value and quality.
customer_reviews.author: Tutiac68

customer_reviews.title: They're uncomfortably small
customer_reviews.text: If you can, purchase something a little larger. These are a bit small and folks with smaller hands could easily get a finger stuck between the cabinet and the backside of the handle pull. That said, the quality of these are fine and they will do the job... but for me, after spending a few thousand dollars to upgrade my kitchen with new cabinets and appliances, I didn't think these pull handles were large enough or looked good enough.
customer_reviews.author: Paul Perkins

customer_reviews.title: The space where you put your fingers isn't spacious but I was doing a project for children so it actually was perfect for me
customer_reviews.text: I had a project where I wanted a decent looking and very inexpensive pull. These were exactly what I was looking for. Standard 3" centers and None of the 8 I used had any issues with stripped holes or anything. The space where you put your fingers isn't spacious but I was doing a project for children so it actually was perfect for me. Quality for the price was excellent.
customer_reviews.author: Jeremy C.

customer_reviews.title: Nice Brushed Nickel Pulls
customer_reviews.text: These are nice metal pull handles in a brushed nickel finish but the screws that came with them were too long and don't sit flush. There's a slight gap which makes them wobbly on the cabinet doors. Perhaps my cabinets are thinner than the average (?) so I'm guessing I need to buy shorter screws now...
customer_reviews.author: Gladys Martinez

customer_reviews.title: Good for the Price
customer_reviews.text: No frill, cheap cabinet handles. Great price for a multi-pack. The look fine. Handles are not very deep, I can't get my entire hand around them. I would buy again if in need. I would not use these for a kitchen or high-use, high-visible area.
customer_reviews.author: Isaac

customer_reviews.title: Works great!
customer_reviews.text: I purchased several packs to replace worn handles in my kitchen. They look great! I did notice that one of the packs didn't have all the screws but it wasn't a big deal since I had the ones from the previous handles. I am very happy with the price I paid and the look of these pulls.
customer_reviews.author: Lori Daughtry

customer_reviews.title: Smaller than I hoped.
customer_reviews.text: I have small hands and even these handles are small for me. The opening to fit your fingers though is the gap of one finger for me and I know for certain men with larger fingers won't be fitting any fingers being these handles to pull the drawer or cabinet out. It's also a little difficult to line up the screws but these is my fault. The quality of these handles is great though.
customer_reviews.author: Kelley D.

customer_reviews.title: Look great
customer_reviews.text: These look great, but the screws that came with them were not the size I needed which made instillation difficult b/c we had to go to the hardware store and figure it out on our own. Plus, the screw pattern wasn't listed, so we had to take a handle with us. We ended up needing 8/32 pattern and 1 1/4" length. Now that they are in they look great on my newly refinished dresser! Way better value that Walmart.
customer_reviews.author: Holly Wagner

customer_reviews.title: Good quality, not so good execution...
customer_reviews.text: I purchased these pulls to update the kitchen in my home prior to putting it on the market. These handles look really nice and the quality is good, but the handles fit too closely to the drawer/cabinet making it difficult to get a hand underneath. They were a great price for the quantity and I'd like purchase again if I were flipping a home as they look really nice and polished, but I wouldn't purchase for my own home to be used on a daily basis.
customer_reviews.author: Heather

customer_reviews.title: Love these, for my nice custom wall craft cabinet in the garage.  Looks great and works great!
customer_reviews.text: Love these. Nice Garage custom craft cabinet. What's not to like. They look like what you see in the picture. I built a custom wall craft cabinet in the garage with drawers and cabinet doors... painted bright white... installed these... love them. I cannot imagine why anyone would give them less than 5 stars. It seems to me the only reason anyone would give them less than 5 stars is that they did not like their appearance - that's not the items fault..
customer_reviews.author: M. Lewis

customer_reviews.title: You can't go wrong with these!
customer_reviews.text: These replaced the 1990s brass and white ceramic hardware on the cabinets in the house we just bought. They instantly improved the look of our kitchen and brought them to 2017. The value cannot be beat- these are the best bang for your buck. I did a lot of shopping around. These really impressed me, but more importantly (and surprisingly), my husband.
customer_reviews.author: Pflu2u

customer_reviews.title: Not 3 inch, waste of money.
customer_reviews.text: Holes were not 3 inch like it says. They were too big. 3.2 inches. .2 makes a big difference.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I really like the product and would purchase again.
customer_reviews.text: The only thing I would think might be improved is the space between the pull and the drawer. My husband's hands are larger than mine, so it is not as easy for him to pull the drawer open. With that being said, I do not have a problem with the pulls sticking out and restricting passage or work space. We used the pulls on my kitchen cabinets and drawers
customer_reviews.author: Joyce Bowman

customer_reviews.title: Great for the price!
customer_reviews.text: My fiancé and I are renting and older apartment and I thought it would make such a big difference to change out the hardware. I posted the before and after. It made such a difference- for $10 I would definitely recommend!!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Cabinet Handles Brushed Nickel - Great Value
customer_reviews.text: Love them. They fit well. Some seemed to be a little off, but that might have been the predrilled holes on the cabinet. I did have to use some of the older screws from the old handles. It seemed some of the screws were a smidge too long, or I couldn't screw them in all the way. They have a nice weight to them and the handle itself is not hollowed out behind. Finish is very nice. Have had them about 6 months and they are still the same as the day I installed them. Can't beat the price.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Why This item you sent it to me made in china. I brought it say made in USA
customer_reviews.text: Made in USA or Imported BEAUTIFUL CABINET PULLS: The Ultra Hardware Decorative Hardware Pull features a Satin Nickel finish to bring out the look of your home. Ideal for use as a functional accent for kitchen or bathroom cabinets and furniture. 1" Mounting screws included for easy installation.
customer_reviews.author: Allen N.

customer_reviews.title: Smaller Than I Expected
customer_reviews.text: These cabinet handles were smaller and skinnier than I expected. That said, they are a decent quality for the price and looked good. But if you're looking for a chunkier handle, look elsewhere.
customer_reviews.author: Jason Huebel

customer_reviews.title: Highly recommend
customer_reviews.text: Great handles for the price! We went with the stainless steel to match our appliances! Be careful of the “oil rubbed bronze” alternative though. People who purchased those have mentioned they are not true oil rubbed bronze and appear to be painted brown. Other than that the satin finish ones we ordered are great! Perfect length and am able to fit four fingers behind handle. Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: kristen boyd

customer_reviews.title: Good vaule but packaging is horrible!
customer_reviews.text: Handles are fine, great for the low cost but if I had known how hard it would be to open package I never would have purchased. I ended up ruining a scissors and cutting my hand on the plastic, ridiculous!
customer_reviews.author: JP

customer_reviews.title: Big Screw Size
customer_reviews.text: They are pretty sturdy for the price but the screws are way too big for my initial cabinets, 25% of the screw would stick out so it was not well secured, tried buying some other screws but they did not go in... the good news is that they fit a drawer I had so I used them there.
customer_reviews.author: Jonathan

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy, simple classic
customer_reviews.text: Did a refinish on the master bath. These finished the look and fit perfectly. Correct length screws and everything.
customer_reviews.author: Frederick A. Williams

customer_reviews.title: Good for rental properties
customer_reviews.text: These look great but all the holes are not drilled evenly. Great for the purpose I've purchased them for. I'm putting these on cabinets in a rental. If they were going in my own home I wouldn't be happy because some of them look crooked.
customer_reviews.author: db

customer_reviews.title: Great Value
customer_reviews.text: These handles may to too small for very large hands, but they work well for us. They look good on the cabinets. The only issue is that the provided screws are too short for standard cabinet doors. Our cabinet maker provided some longer ones, and all was good.
customer_reviews.author: nutrinancy

customer_reviews.title: Just what I wanted - great price
customer_reviews.text: I repainted some kitchen cabinets and installed them in the garage. They needed new handles and these worked out perfectly. Great price. I wouldn't want to use them on custom cabinetry, but they are great on repurposed cabinets in my garage. Nice!
customer_reviews.author: Barbara R

customer_reviews.title: Good Product
customer_reviews.text: I purchased these handles to update an old dresser and they look great. Easy to install and much cheaper than products at the home improvement stores.
customer_reviews.author: S.Moore

customer_reviews.title: I couldn't be happier with these drawer pulls
customer_reviews.text: So, we bought a house with gold look knobs everywhere. EVERYWHERE. Deciding that something needed to change right away, I hopped online and ordered these handles and some new knobs. I couldn't be happier with these drawer pulls! They are heavy and sleek and were easy to install. The pricing is exceptional for the look. This small investment was transformative to our outdated kitchen.
customer_reviews.author: Evelyn Foster

customer_reviews.title: Not Eligible for Returns
customer_reviews.text: Bought three types of drawer pulls because I wasn't sure what would look best in my kitchen. These are totally fine and would have worked, but we ended up choosing something else. Went to return them only to find that they can't be returned?! No real reason provided either. Super frustrating.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Such a deal
customer_reviews.text: These are nice, high quality, and quite the deal. I needed one more. I found it at the store, but it was so expensive there. What a deal these are here.
customer_reviews.author: mark

customer_reviews.title: #59156 Cabinet Drawer Pulls
customer_reviews.text: So glad I purchased these to replace/update the ones in my kitchen!! They are so dressy & sleek. Very sturdy w/ smooth surfaces. Recommend these to anyone.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great for the price!
customer_reviews.text: When I bought these, I was looking for the cheapest handles possible because I needed 30 handles for three dressers. These ended up looking just as nice as the more expensive brands I was looking at. They were easy to attach and were very sturdy. They are a bit shallow compared to other types, but for me it didn't matter since I just use one finger to open them.
customer_reviews.author: Briana Dee

customer_reviews.title: VERY Nice!
customer_reviews.text: They are VERY nice, sturdy and easy to install. I would like to suggest adding screws long enough to fit drawers though. Love them!
customer_reviews.author: Joni

customer_reviews.title: These are the best low cost option for a quick spruce up
customer_reviews.text: These are the best low cost option for a quick spruce up. Moved into a house with old bronze and gold hardware and for under $60 I was able to replace the entire house's fixtures with these. They look great, were easy to install and while the finish may wear eventually, they wear on the expensive ones too so I'm happy for the cost savings.
customer_reviews.author: hayuf

customer_reviews.title: Elegant
customer_reviews.text: It's a beautiful and a welcome part of the household. The material is high quality.
customer_reviews.author: John

customer_reviews.title: Great value and look great!
customer_reviews.text: Bought three packs of these and installed in all the drawers in our house. I had to buy longer bolts for some of or drawers, but that's not a big deal. The 1" seems pretty common on newer drawers. Great value, and I'm very happy with these so far.
customer_reviews.author: Mike Young

customer_reviews.title: Great! You may need longer screws.
customer_reviews.text: We needed a TON of handles, as our new house had none. The screws are #8-32 machine screws, about an inch long. While we were able to use these for SOME of our cabinets and drawers, we ended up needing to buy longer screws for MOST of our cabinets and drawers (about $6 for 100 screws at Lowes; Not bad). They look great, they feel great, our fingers don't get stuck in them, the underside is smooth. They feel natural to grab and open things with. Great for the price! Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Jenna

customer_reviews.title: The material and the smoothness
customer_reviews.text: I liked that they match very well with my other brushed nickel appliances. But I can almost see that they might loose someone of the brushed polish since one of pieces had some missing around the corners. They look very nice otherwise, they seem durable so far and looked great on our grey cabinets and match well with the entire grey oatmeal theme we have in the kitchen and the greenroom
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Don’t Look Any Further or pay more!!
customer_reviews.text: Don’t look any further! The value of these handles are awesome! I was a bit afraid that they wouldn’t be exactly what I wanted and cheap looking but they look exactly like the ones you’d pay around $5 or more (for ONE!) at your home hardware stores. They really compliment my cabinets and new hinges and give it that update look I was going for.
customer_reviews.author: Allie C.

customer_reviews.title: You won't be dissapointed, buy them :)
customer_reviews.text: I purchased these for my kitchen cabinets in my rental apartment. I didnt want to spend that much yet have nice looking handles. The kitchen cabinets now look so much better. Im very pleased.
customer_reviews.author: Beaches127

customer_reviews.title: Like the look but screws too short
customer_reviews.text: We like the look of these handles but my husband says the screws are too short for our cabinets. We will need to purchase new screws or find a way to return the product...
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I literally gave them away at work because they were useless.
customer_reviews.text: These pulls were okay, but they looked really awful on my cabinets and unfortunately were non-returnable. I literally gave them away at work because they were useless.
customer_reviews.author: Allison

customer_reviews.title: Small, thin and lightweight
customer_reviews.text: It's a good deal for the price, I guess. Just know that these are thin, light weight handles and a little on the small side. Don't expect them to have a huge impact as far as decor goes. Overall, they'll get the job done.
customer_reviews.author: CheeseChex

customer_reviews.title: Easy to install
customer_reviews.text: We sanded and painted our old kitchen cabinets in attempts to make them look better, but something was still missing. We decided to put knobs and handles to make them look more modern.We purchased these because we thought they would match our stainless steal appliances and they matched perfectly. Very happy with the new look and they were easy to install.
customer_reviews.author: Erin Padilla

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: Just what I wanted at a very reasonable price. I wanted streamlined easy to clean handles and knobs in my kitchen. Excellent value.
customer_reviews.author: Yvonne

customer_reviews.title: Great Drawer pulls
customer_reviews.text: These fit right in with the style of my Southbend lathe , finished off my added instrument drawers
customer_reviews.author: Joseph L. Vincent

customer_reviews.title: Great Value.
customer_reviews.text: These are so much more expensive in the hardware stores. They are the same quality and really undated the look of my kitchen cabinets.
customer_reviews.author: elemon

customer_reviews.title: good quality
customer_reviews.text: finish is good quality screws fit perfect handle has good weight to them not cheap feeling
customer_reviews.author: Family Man

customer_reviews.title: Good selection and a good price
customer_reviews.text: These are great quality. This is definitely gonna be the weather I’m gonna purchase my hardware from now on. Good selection good price
customer_reviews.author: Mrakansonline

customer_reviews.title: Low Cost & High Quality
customer_reviews.text: These are perfect for my 1950 kitchen. I recently restored the original cabinets in my home and wanted to match the original hardware as close as I could without breaking the bank. I'm so glad I chose these! No problems with install and they look and feel like I paid a lot more than I did. Feels like they will hold up for quite some time.
customer_reviews.author: alexa

customer_reviews.title: can't beat the price
customer_reviews.text: love how these dressed up my white cabinets. you can't beat the price and they are well constructed .
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Work great
customer_reviews.text: We are currently remodeling our house. I wanted hardware that didn't stick out to far and wasn't so bulk looking. These worked out great, the prices is also great we ordered 6 packages of these and saved a ton of money compared to what we would have paid at a hardware store.
customer_reviews.author: Crystal Leon

customer_reviews.title: Upgrade for cheap!
customer_reviews.text: Used these on the bathroom cabinets. Was concerned it might rust with the humidity variances but it has not. All parts were there and easy to install. Gave it a facelift for not a lot of money.
customer_reviews.author: abbk08

customer_reviews.title: These handles were exactly what we were looking for!
customer_reviews.text: When we were beginning the process of remodeling our kitchen we searched everywhere for just the right drawer and cabinet handles. We never quite found the right ones to fit our needs. Then, we discovered these! The finish is excellent and they are extremely sturdy! The screws that were provided enabled us to fit these handles on snug and after a couple of weeks of use, you can tell these handles are very durable. I highly recommend these handles!
customer_reviews.author: Matt/Jenn

customer_reviews.title: Value purchase
customer_reviews.text: I was able to purchase this package of 10 for less that what 4 similar ones would have cost me at my local hardware store. SO I saved money and will have additional ones for future projects.
customer_reviews.author: JD

customer_reviews.title: Not what I Ordered
customer_reviews.text: I ordered 4" at the center pulls and they sent me 3" at the center. I cant use them at all unless I want to drill new holes in all my cabinets which I don't I ordered 4" for a reason. Wish I would have gotten what I ordered. Maybe they would have worked. Not at all what I ordered.
customer_reviews.author: Shirley M. Christensen

customer_reviews.title: Smaller than I was thinking but nicely made. Screws are a hair too long for ...
customer_reviews.text: Smaller than I was thinking but nicely made. Screws are a hair too long for 3/4" drawer faces and I had to add a washer.
customer_reviews.author: Nick

customer_reviews.title: Great Deal. Looks Great. Easy to install.
customer_reviews.text: Great deal on these handles; less expensive than home depot and lowes. Easy to install. Looks great and worked on our cabinets. Good way to update your cabinets without spending too much money. Will be buying more for our bathroom cabinets too!
customer_reviews.author: Elsa

customer_reviews.title: Not bad
customer_reviews.text: It is good for the money. I replace them with our kitchen and bathroom old handles. A drawback is the screws are not always fit and I have to use washes. Overall it is good.
customer_reviews.author: NShi

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful
customer_reviews.text: You can’t beat Amazon’s price. They are very well made and they look beautiful in my new kitchen. I’m a bargain shopper and these have not disappointed me. Well worth the money.
customer_reviews.author: Gina French

customer_reviews.title: I was delighted to find these for a RV remodel project
customer_reviews.text: I was delighted to find these for a RV remodel project. I was concerned they might be off .01 of an inch or something, coming from China. But they were a PERFECT fit for the holes that were already there. Quality is what you'd expect to find at Lowes. I would buy these again.
customer_reviews.author: Theresa Lode

customer_reviews.title: Great - double check screw length in case you need washers/spacers.
customer_reviews.text: These are really great handles. My only issue is that the screws provided were a bit too long for the cabinet doors/drawers - so I had to go get some small (inexpensive) washer-type spacers. Otherwise, they work perfectly and look great!
customer_reviews.author: SW

customer_reviews.title: Nice, Pretty, Fit Well
customer_reviews.text: These are nice, pretty, fit well. I'm changing all the cabinet hardware to satin nickel, without any projections that can catch a blow dryer cord. These are perfect!
customer_reviews.author: Jen9999

customer_reviews.title: Nice handles.
customer_reviews.text: Nice looking handles we had to find different length screws due to our cabinets. Wasn't a Prob at home depot at all. Besides that they are good to look at and you can't beat price.
customer_reviews.author: Mr.Bill

customer_reviews.title: screws may not fit, depending on the thickness of your cabinet drawers.
customer_reviews.text: Reasonably priced, functional and attractive drawer pulls. Two sets of screws per drawer pull are provided to accommodate different drawer thicknesses. However, the longer of the 2 screws was 1-1/8" and I needed 1-1/2" screws. After a trip to the hardware store, all is well and these look great.
customer_reviews.author: Mike Harley

customer_reviews.title: Worth the buy!
customer_reviews.text: Really happy with how these look. Easy to install! Instant upgrade for some old cabinets. :)
customer_reviews.author: Katrina

customer_reviews.title: Yes!
customer_reviews.text: Bought this product 10 months ago to update my furniture. They were easy to install and are very sturdy. It’s an easy modern way to update furniture. Good value!
customer_reviews.author: Rose

customer_reviews.title: Great hardware
customer_reviews.text: Arrived in good shape with all materials required. Only comes with hardware for 3/4" door thickness, so if you're attaching to a drawer that has two front layers (the drawer front wall in addition to the drawer face), you'll need to go to the hardware store to purchase a few 1-3/4" machine screws. No big deal; they're prett cheap.
customer_reviews.author: Surgere

customer_reviews.title: They are simply elegant
customer_reviews.text: I liked the fact they are simple and easy to pull, without getting my fingers stuck. Two of them did have mis-drilled holes. Luckily, I bought extra.
customer_reviews.author: KDepue

customer_reviews.title: These look fantastic and we’re great value to purchase here
customer_reviews.text: These look fantastic and we’re great value to purchase here
customer_reviews.author: Erica Bader

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Upgrade for the money
customer_reviews.text: We just moved into a house with old brass pull knobs and these made such a major difference! Would highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Erica

customer_reviews.title: cabinet pulls/handles
customer_reviews.text: Loved them. I replaced old cabinet handles in an entire kitchen and updated the look.
customer_reviews.author: abracadeborah

customer_reviews.title: They look great and they're easy to install
customer_reviews.text: These drawer handles are exactly as described. They look great and they're easy to install. They come with all the necessary screws so you'll only need a drill, measuring tape and a pen or marker. My kitchen looks much more pulled together after I installed these drawer handles to the drawers and cabinets and they are reasonably priced.
customer_reviews.author: Tiffany B

customer_reviews.title: Highly recommend!
customer_reviews.text: Great quality, and low price. Put these on my bathroom vanity after re painting it and its looks great!
customer_reviews.author: Ajw5

customer_reviews.title: Buy Buy Buy
customer_reviews.text: Great quality for a fraction of store prices. Love them
customer_reviews.author: joyce bouton

customer_reviews.title: Not for us
customer_reviews.text: Sub par quality had to buy longer screws and handles bent easily
customer_reviews.author: Buckeye

customer_reviews.title: Worked perfectly for two bathroom vanities
customer_reviews.text: I needed to replace the cabinet pulls on two vanities and these look really nice. They are smooth and have a classic look. Much cheaper than the big box stores.
customer_reviews.author: philephan81

customer_reviews.title: you get your monies worth
customer_reviews.text: these are well worth what you pay for. I have extra ones if ever needed. Sharp looking handles!
customer_reviews.author: terry

customer_reviews.title: Handles
customer_reviews.text: Replaced all our handles in the camper. Really gave it a different look. These fit perfect. And have held up.
customer_reviews.author: kelli white

customer_reviews.title: Great Value/Great Hardware
customer_reviews.text: I've been replacing all the 64 handles after having cabinets painted. These handles are perfect for my upgrade. Very nice modern look and great value.
customer_reviews.author: Cheryl

customer_reviews.title: Great value
customer_reviews.text: These look beautiful on my refurbished cedar cabinet. The handles were easy to install and exactly as described. The price is very economical.
customer_reviews.author: Pat

customer_reviews.title: Look great.
customer_reviews.text: Nice product. Looks great on the cabinets. Fantastic value. All screws fit perfectly.
customer_reviews.author: TST

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Easy to install and looks really nice! It’s on the small side, so make your measurements before you order.
customer_reviews.author: Camila Medeiros

customer_reviews.title: Pleasantly surprised
customer_reviews.text: Haven't been using them very long, but so far they are great! Look good, way better than the price would suggest. Sturdy enough for my dresser drawers. I can fit enough fingers in and under. Comes with hardware. Hardware is kind of long but I used them on an antique dresser (actual wood) so it worked great for my project, However, if you have something thinner you may need your own screws.
customer_reviews.author: Jessicka

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: These are great. Sturdy and they look good. I had to use the screws from my old handles because the ones that came with them were too long. Only downside, I wish they would have came with a template for the screws.
customer_reviews.author: Steven Bradner

customer_reviews.title: Get your own screws
customer_reviews.text: The actual handle is great, but you are likely to need new screws. They're poor quality and, for my drawers, too short. Other than that, they are great :)
customer_reviews.author: Sara Jo

product_meta.title: Ultra Hardware 59156 Cabinet Hardware Handle Pull, 10 Count
product_meta.description:
The Ultra Hardware Decorative Hardware Pull features a Satin Nickel finish to bring out the look of your home. Ideal for use as a functional accent for kitchen or bathroom cabinets and furniture. 1" Mounting screws included for easy installation. Black, white, or wooden cabinets all benefit from satin nickel finish hardware. It goes perfectly in kitchens and bathrooms. They’ll look great with your fittings and appliances for a cohesive home. Ultra Hardware offers quality products for builder’s hardware and cabinet hardware. Within the builder's channel, Ultra Hardware products span 14 categories including Storm & Screen Door Hardware, Door Security, Builder’s Hardware, Gate & Garage Hardware, Home Hardware, Wire Goods and more. Ultra Hardware’s Cabinet Hardware product line offers the full range of decorative knobs and pulls from the trendiest to tested traditional styles and finishes. With hundreds of designs and decorative finishes, Ultra Hardware gives every homeowner an option for the important finishing touch to complete a room makeover or renovation. Package contains (1) Ultra Hardware 59156 Cabinet Hardware Handle Pull, 10 Count. Adjusts to door thickness. High quality wood. Designer's Edge brushed satin nickel cabinet hardware. Satin nickel. 3-Inch center to center. Packed 10.

FROM THE MANUFACTURER
Satin nickel handle pull. 3-Inch center to center. 10 piece value pack.

PAIRS PERFECTLY WITH YOUR DÉCOR: Black, white, or wooden cabinets all benefit from satin nickel finish hardware. It goes perfectly in kitchens and bathrooms. They’ll look great with your fittings and appliances for a cohesive home.
